User instruction: 创建新文档并添加标题"销售业绩报告"，添加水印"机密"。
Feasible API sequence: create_and_save_docx(doc_path, "");add_heading(doc_path, "销售业绩报告", level=1);add_watermark(doc_path, "机密");

User instruction: 插入一个柱状图展示各季度销售额。
